content.question: The overall trend in global carbon dioxide emissions as shown in Graph 1 was primarily caused by the

choices.label: increased use of petroleum and other fossil fuels
destruction of rain forests and expansion of deserts

content.answer: increased use of petroleum and other fossil fuels

topic.text: 9.3: Technological Advances - Debates about the Environment after 1900

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
